thousand

gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

a promise worth one thousand in gold (idiom); a promise that must be kept
can't be bought for one thousand in gold (idiom)
one word worth a thousand in gold (idiom)/(in praise of a piece of writing or calligraphy) each character is perfect/each word is highly valued
a promise worth one thousand in gold (idiom); a promise that must be kept
lit. stake a thousand pieces of gold on one throw (idiom); to throw away money recklessly/extravagant
time is gold/every minute counts
one word worth a thousand in gold (idiom); valuable advice/words of enormous weight

Prescriptions Worth a Thousand in Gold, early Tang compendium of herbal medicine by Sun Simiao 孫思邈|孙思邈[Sun1 Si1 miao3]

pinyin: jia1 lei3 qian1 jin1 , zuo4 bu4 chui2 tang2

definition: lit. my worn-out broom, a thousand in gold (idiom); fig. sentimental value/I wouldn't be parted with it for anything.

sentences.english: However, in a word, for the hard-working men, every minute is precious.
sentences.chinese: 但总而言之，对于忙碌工作的人，有时一刻就值千金。

sentences.english: He thinks nothing of throwing away a thousand dollars at the gambling house.
sentences.chinese: 他在赌场里一掷千金满不在乎。

sentences.english: Isn't this a priceless morning, madam ?
sentences.chinese: 真是个千金难买的早晨，夫人。

sentences.english: The value of a university education is priceless.
sentences.chinese: 大学教育的益处是千金难买的。

sentences.english: Jinjiufu keeps its promise of faith and is as sincere as gold to its partners.
sentences.chinese: 金九福对信誉一诺千金，对客户及合作伙伴赤诚如金。

sentences.english: A little money now could go a long way.
For many people, they are worth their weight in gold.
sentences.chinese: 很多人都是价值千金的。

sentences.english: The ancient has a promise that can be counted on view , this view is very correct.
sentences.chinese: 古人有一诺千金的说法，这说法是很准确的。

sentences.english: All in all, for these hard-working men, sometimes one quarter-hour worthes thousands of gold.
sentences.chinese: 但总而言之，对于忙碌工作的人，有时一刻就值千金。

sentences.english: Land is very precious in urban areas and its price is pushed up higher and higher, which will continue in the future.
sentences.chinese: 都市寸土千金，地价炒得越来越高，今后将更高。

sentences.english: Congratulations from the entire Wang family. We wish you joy and happiness in your little daughter.
sentences.chinese: 王家全体成员恭喜您们生了千金，敬祝幸福快乐。

sentences.english: The president of sun with his daughter came together in this opening ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 孙总携千金一起参加开业庆典。

sentences.english: Uli lieutenant answered as well as gold.
sentences.chinese: 乌利中尉一诺千金地回答。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the main therapeutic effects of Fuke Qianjin Soft Capsule (FQSC).
sentences.chinese: 目的研究妇科千金软胶囊的主要药效作用。

sentences.english: Night hours in spring are extremely precious.
